import React,{useState} from 'react' import "./App.css" const Login=()=>{ const [email,setEmail]=useState(""); const [passw,setPassw]=useState(""); const[dataInput, setDataInput]=useState(""); const submitThis=()=>{ const info={email:email,passw:passw}; setDataInput([info]); } return(
{renderErrorMessage("pass")}
{renderErrorMessage("uname")}
{renderErrorMessage("pass")}
{renderErrorMessage("uname")}
) } export default Login
